fullplot: The priest Gunilla is trying get her adult sons Thor and Odin, who is obsessed with Hardrock, to move away from home. They refuse to leave and start a family. But when Jenny, the village schoolteacher and Line Dance Instructor, shows up everything changes. Behind each others backs begins the brothers battle for Jenny's heart.
